metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16738 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
tinc 1.0.30 through 1.0.34 has a broken authentication protocol, although there is a partial mitigation. This is fixed in 1.1. The authentication protocol allows an oracle attack that could potentially be exploited.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16738` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

tinc - 1.0.35-2build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tinc package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.35-2build1').
